com.dua3.meja.model

Interface Font

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericFont, PoiFont

    public interface Font
    Interface describing fonts used in workbooks.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Font.FontDef
      A mutable class holding font attributes to help creating immutable font instances.

    • Method Summary

      • deriveFont

        Font deriveFont(Font.FontDef fd)
        Derive font.

        A new font based on this font is returned. The attributes defined fd are applied to the new font. If an attribute in fd is not set, the attribute is copied from this font.

        Parameters:
        fd - the Font.FontDef describing the attributes to set
        Returns:
        new Font instance
